hint: Apply aggressive predicate pushdown to filter date_dim and store tables early, then use explicit JOIN syntax for better optimizer control and join order.
Isolate selective date_dim filters into CTEs, pre-filter store and fact tables, then join materialized subsets to reduce intermediate result sizes.
Materialize pre-filtered dimension and fact tables in separate CTEs, then restructure joins to eliminate redundant scans and leverage efficient hash joins.
Decompose the self-join pattern using window functions or derived tables, convert the date range condition to a join filter, and pre-fetch dimension keys.
